Player History
Signed as a free agent by Seattle on 4/3/1985 to a 1-year deal worth $1,164,000 per year...
Earned first career win on 4/7/1985...
Was selected to the 1985 Allstar game...
Traded from Seattle to St. Louis on 2/8/1986 (Going to SEA: 3B Paul Molitor. Going to STL: CF Ivan Calderon, P Chuck Cary, P Randy O'Neal, SS Spike Owen)...
2/2/1987: Gets a new one-year contract worth $382,143 through salary arbitration...
2/2/1988: Gets a new one-year contract worth $382,143 through salary arbitration...
Was selected to the 1988 Allstar game...
2/2/1989: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,348,571 through salary arbitration...
10/10/1989: Signed a contract extension with St. Louis, $1,550,000 per year, for 1 years.
Had first career hit on 4/16/1990, off Mike Bielecki (PIT)...
